author: Special Correspondent
text:
Muthukumaran (53), an Assistant Commissioner (Enforcement I - PA) in Commercial Taxes Department, has allegedly committed suicide at his brother’s house here on Monday night.

Police said that Muthukumaran, who was working in the Greams Road office in Chennai, came to his brother’s house at Annamalai Nagar here on Monday night and allegedly committed suicide by hanging from the ceiling fan after he went to bed in the first floor of the house.

He was found dead on Tuesday morning when his sister-in-law went to serve him tea, the police said.

His brother Swaminathan, working as Superintendent in Postal Department, was away in Theni, the police added.

According to the police, he left a note stating that he was responsible for all his misdeeds and his wife was in no way responsible for them. The properties were in his wife’s name, he had said in the note. Suicide prevention helplines were available at 104 (State-run), and 044 24640050 (Sneha).
title: Official commits suicide
